content: Preview the interface with the selected color applied

comment.text: This translation key is used for the tooltip content that appears when users click on a help button to preview the interface with a selected color applied. It provides a brief description of what the user will see in the preview.

usage.context:
<HelpButton
 place="right"
 tooltipContent={
 <div>
 <Text fontSize="12px" fontWeight={400}>
 {t("Settings:PreviewTooltipDescription")}
 </Text>
 <Link
 isHovered
 type="page"
 href={appearanceBlockHelpUrl}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Tətbiq edilmiş seçilmiş rənglə interfeysə əvvəlcədən baxın' is a bit literal and doesn't flow naturally in Azerbaijani. While technically correct, it sounds awkward. A more natural phrasing would convey the same meaning more elegantly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Seçilmiş rənglə interfeysin önə baxışı

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word order could be improved for better readability in Azerbaijani.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Seçilmiş rənglə interfeysin önə baxışı

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Визуализирайте интерфейса с приложен избран цвят' doesn't fully capture the meaning of 'Preview the interface with the selected color applied'. 'Визуализирайте' (Visualize) is too literal and doesn't convey the idea of a preview. A better translation would emphasize the preview aspect.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Предварителен преглед на интерфейса с избран цвят

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Náhled rozhraní s vybranou barvou" is too literal and doesn't convey the meaning of 'Preview the interface with the selected color applied' effectively. It translates to 'Preview of the interface with the selected color'. A more natural phrasing would be needed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Náhled rozhraní s použitou barvou

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Vorschau der Benutzeroberfläche mit der ausgewählten Farbe' is a literal translation but slightly awkward. 'Preview' implies a more dynamic or interactive experience, which 'Vorschau' doesn't quite capture. A more natural phrasing would better convey the meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vorschau der Oberfläche mit der ausgewählten Farbe

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Esikatsele käyttöliittymä valitun värin kanssa' is a literal translation that doesn't flow naturally in Finnish. While technically correct, it sounds awkward. A more idiomatic translation would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Esikatsele käyttöliittymää valitulla värillä.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Prévisualisation de l'interface avec la couleur sélectionnée' is a literal translation and not the most natural way to express the meaning in French. 'Prévisualisation' is acceptable but a more fluent option would be 'Aperçu'. The phrasing 'avec la couleur sélectionnée' is also a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Aperçu de l'interface avec la couleur choisie

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Դիտել միջերեսը ընտրված գույնով' while literally meaning 'View the interface with the selected color', doesn't fully convey the nuance of 'Preview'. 'Preview' suggests a temporary display or test, whereas 'View' is a more permanent action. It lacks the idea of a test or temporary application of the color.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Կիցում ընտրված գույնը դիտարկեք միջերեսում (Kit'um enqrrvach goy'n'i ditarek mijeresum)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Anteprima dell’interfaccia con il colore selezionato applicato' is a literal translation that sounds awkward in Italian. A more natural phrasing would be 'Visualizza un'anteprima dell'interfaccia con il colore selezionato' or 'Anteprima dell'interfaccia con il colore scelto'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Visualizza un'anteprima dell'interfaccia con il colore selezionato

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Korean translation lacks a period at the end of the sentence, which is standard Korean punctuation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 선택한 색상이 적용된 인터페이스 미리 보기.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation 'ກວດກາລຸ່ມໜ້າດ້ວຍສີທີ່ເລືອກໃຊ້.' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'Preview the interface with the selected color applied'.  'ກວດກາ' (gvet-ga) means 'check' or 'inspect', which is not the intent of a preview.  'ໃຊ້' (chai) means 'use', but it implies application rather than a visual representation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຕົວຢ່າງ: ມອງຕົວຢ່າງຂອງໜ້າຈໍດ້ວຍສີທີ່ເລືອກ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the sentence structure 'ກວດກາລຸ່ມໜ້າດ້ວຍສີທີ່ເລືອກໃຊ້' is slightly awkward. The use of 'ດ້ວຍ' can be a bit clunky here.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider restructuring to improve flow, although the impact is minor.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Podgląd interfejsu z zastosowanym wybranym kolorem' is a bit literal and could be improved for naturalness in Polish. While technically correct, it sounds slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Zapoznaj się z interfejsem z wybranym kolorem.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Pré-visualize a interface com a cor selecionada aplicada' is not the most natural or accurate rendering of 'Preview the interface with the selected color applied.' 'Pré-visualize' is a valid translation of preview but is less common than alternatives. The use of 'a' before 'interface' is grammatically correct but stylistically less preferable to omitting it. 'Aplicada' is redundant.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Visualizar a interface com a cor selecionada.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Visualizar a interface com a cor selecionada aplicada' is a literal translation but sounds awkward in Portuguese. 'Visualizar' is correct, but the rest is overly verbose. A more natural phrasing would emphasize the effect of applying the color.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pré-visualizar a interface com a cor selecionada.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is slightly awkward and could be improved for naturalness. While technically correct, it's not the most common or elegant way to express the meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Предварительный просмотр интерфейса с выбранным цветом

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'පහතින් තෝරාගත් වර්ණය යෙදූ අතුරු මුහුණත පෙරදසුන් කරන්න.' is a literal translation and sounds awkward.  'පහතින්' (beneath) isn't the correct preposition to use here. A more natural phrasing would imply 'preview the interface *with* the selected color applied, but this needs more nuance.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පහතින් තෝරාගත් වර්ණය යෙදීමෙන් අතුරු මුහුණත පෙරදසුන් කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure could be improved for better flow. 'අතුරු මුහුණත පෙරදසුන් කරන්න' can be simplified.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: තෝරාගත් වර්ණය යෙදූ අතුරු මුහුණත පෙරදසුන් බලන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Náhľad rozhrania s aplikovaním vybranej farby' is not a natural or accurate rendering of 'Preview the interface with the selected color applied'. It's overly literal and clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Predbehnite vzhľad rozhrania s vybranou farbou.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically grammatically correct, 's aplikovaním vybranej farby' is awkward. The sentence structure could be improved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Eliminate 's aplikovaním' or restructure the sentence for better flow.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Predoglejte si vmesnik z uporabljeno izbrano barvo' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'Preview the interface with the selected color applied'. It's grammatically correct, but the wording could be improved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Predoglejte vmesnik z izbrano barvo.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Преглед интерфејса са изабраном бојом" is a literal translation but doesn't quite capture the meaning of 'Preview the interface'. A more natural Serbian (Cyrillic) translation would convey the idea of seeing a sample or demonstration of the interface.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Погледајте пример интерфејса са изабраном бојом

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Pregled interfejsa sa izabranom bojom" doesn't fully capture the nuance of 'Preview the interface with the selected color applied'. It translates to 'Preview the interface with the chosen color'. While understandable, it lacks the 'applied' aspect.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pregled interfejsa sa primenjenom izabranom bojom

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Seçilen renkle uygulanmış arayüz ön izlemesini görüntüleyin' is a bit literal and could be improved for naturalness in Turkish. 'Görüntüleyin' (view) isn't the most common or natural way to express 'preview' in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Seçilen renkle arayüzün önizlemesini görün
